tool_description: Used to check if the vendor has a valid FSSAI certificate to produce and sell food and beverages.

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Fetches the API result using the request ID received in previous responses.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the request to fetch results.

api_list.name: FSSAI Verification API (async)
api_list.description: Verifies a food and beverage manufacturing vendor. Use the GET call to fetch results using the request ID.
